oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A simple exposition to impossibility of simultaneous time and frequency compactness
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MEHTA, N
GADRE, VM
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: time-bounded
frequency-bounded
uncertainity principle
time and frequency compactness
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Impossibility of simultaneous time and frequency compactness is a well known theorem occurring in several introductory texts on Signal and Systems. A proof of the theorem is however left to an advanced discussion on Fourier analysis. This paper presents a lucid proof of the same, employing simple properties of the Fourier transform.
